Areas.Name: xBDD - Features - Generate Reports - Generate Html Report

Features.Capability: shorten the area name by removing the beginning of the name that matches a provided string
Features.Name: Shorten Area Name

Steps.Name: you generate an html report from test results of a single passing scenario set to skip the string 'My ' in the area name
you navigate to the test html report with a single passing scenario
you will see the area title line is visible
you will see the area title line has text 'Area 1'
you generate an html report from test results of a single passing scenario set to skip the string 'No Match' in the area name
you navigate to the test html report with a single passing scenario
you will see the area title line is visible
you will see the area title line has text 'My Area 1'
you generate an html report from test results of a single passing scenario set to skip the string 'My Area 1' in the area name
you navigate to the test html report with a single passing scenario
you will see the area title line is visible
you will see the area title line has text '[Missing! (or Full Name Skipped)]'

Features.Value: shorten the area name in the Html report.

Features.Capability: calling the SortTestRunResults method on the test run: 'xB.CurrentRun.SortTestRunResults' before running the html report
Features.Name: Sort Test Run Results

Steps.Name: you generate an html report from a test run that is not sorted
you navigate to the sample test html report that is not sorted
you click when the area title line is visible
you click when the feature name is visible
you will see the feature name has text 'Sample All Outcome Feature' because it was the first feature alphabetically
you will see the scenario name has text 'Failed Scenario' because it is the first scenario alphabetically
you generate an html report from a test run that is sorted
you navigate to the sample test html report that is sorted
you click when the area title line is visible
you click when the feature name is visible
you will see the feature name has text 'Sample Passing Feature' because it was the first in the feature sort
